thread.title: EU president lashes out at Trump over Iran, trade

title: EU president lashes out at Trump over Iran, trade
text:
EU president lashes out at Trump over Iran, trade 12:15am IST - 01:46
U.S. President Donald Trump has ''rid Europe of all illusions'' by quitting the Iran nuclear deal and driving trade disputes, the European Union chairman said on Wednesday, underlining the depth of trans-Atlantic discord. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
U.S. President Donald Trump has "rid Europe of all illusions" by quitting the Iran nuclear deal and driving trade disputes, the European Union chairman said on Wednesday, underlining the depth of trans-Atlantic discord.
